title: WRECKED: Steamy Bad Boy Biker Love Story
description: Janie is a big, beautiful woman floundering after the death of her husband. Mired in grief she’s finding it difficult to move on with her life. Until Max, a grizzled, bad boy biker wanders into Misty’s bar and takes her by hilarious storm. He comes on strong with the raunchiest of pickup lines that surprisingly has her fidgeting in her seat. This curvy heroine hopes to elude him, but he’s relentless in his unrestrained, playful pursuit. Caught in the vortex of his passion, she turns a blind eye to the red flags that shimmer in the distance. Will the secrets Max holds dear be too much for their escalating, steamy romance to survive? Frolic through the pages of this amusing romp and find out for yourself.
author: Abbey Caine
